thread.title: Good location for Olympia
thread.title_full: Good location for Olympia - Review of London Lodge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Faye B
title: Good location for Olympia
text:
I visited the hotel as I was attending Recruitment Expo at Olympia, 21st/22nd February.
The hotel was very pleasant and clean. My check-in experience was very good indeed and on arrival I was upgraded to a superior double. The room was very clean and I was offered fresh tea and or coffee on arrival too. Breakfast was also very good and the continental offering was substantial for my needs, however, a cooked breakfast was also on offer for a small additional charge. Overall the hotel was of a very good standard and in a nice area of Kensington with many pubs, bars and restaurant a short walk away.
